name: Syndctd
description:
We are a team of green tea steeping, espresso steaming, protein shaking specialists who strive to do the most cutting-edge work for the brands we service. Our clients love us because we aim to know their business as well as their own employees, allowing us to implement tactics that will really move the needle. Every day, we focus on branding that's rooted in the beautiful balance of precision and art that is consumer perception.
We are results-driven dreamers, inspired by our highly creative team and grounded in the measurable success of our strategy. We are Syndctd.
